name: Marble Legend Pro
description:
Marble Legend Pro - Deluxe version for "Marble Legend", which has hit 75 Million downloads!

Marble Legend is a brand new and amazing casual game! For the legendary treasure, you have to survive over six secret scenes in this puzzle adventure!

How to play:
1. Shooting to match three or more colored balls.
2. Tap on the transmitter can swapping the current ball and the next ball.
3. Boost your score with power-ups and combos.

Features:
- AD Free
- Stunning effects and HD graphics
- Easy to learn but hard to fully master
- Classic gameplay and many challenging levels
- Many secret maps and levels, and more will come!
- Arrows, bombs and more interesting props you should learn from game

Thanks every players, any suggestion is welcome!
